title: BACKYARD ORB / more bullet thoughts
description: quick comments with kim or not about the other bullet holes in this wall.

dialogueTree.title: Pain Threshold: "The spread pattern of these bullet..."
dialogueTree.text: The spread pattern of these bullet holes makes your chest ache. Your breath grows heavier.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Another set of awfully old bullet h..."
links.text: Another set of awfully old bullet holes.

links.title: You: "Examine closer."
links.text: Examine closer.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You peer into the faded marks in th..."
links.text: You peer into the faded marks in the stone... they peer back like an endless row of tiny black holes. Sweat starts trickling down your brow.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "This is bad mojo, man! Fuckin' horr..."
links.text: This is bad mojo, man! Fuckin' horrible mojo. The end draws near!

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Your chest feels tight, looking at..."
links.text: Your chest feels tight, looking at them. It's closing in... caving in, ever tighter. Your breathing grows even heavier.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You okay there?" The lieutenant's..."
links.text: "You okay there?" The lieutenant's sudden voice cuts like a blade, bringing you out of the stupor.

links.title: You: "(Breathe out sharply.) "Huh, yeah-y..."
links.text: (Breathe out sharply.) "Huh, yeah-yeah, I'm fine."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You were looking pale there for a..."
links.text: "You were looking pale there for a second. What are you looking at?"

links.title: You: ""Man, I started feeling really bad..."
links.text: "Man, I started feeling really bad for a second."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Might be the after-effects of your..."
links.text: "Might be the after-effects of your... past escapades. What are you looking at?"

links.title: You: ""These bullet holes look like the b..."
links.text: "These bullet holes look like the bullet holes we saw before."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Bullet holes generally look the sa..."
links.text: "Bullet holes generally look the same, so... probably." He leans in to inspect the wall. "But you are right, more old bullet holes from the Revolution."

links.title: You: ""Man, how many people got shot duri..."
links.text: "Man, how many people got shot during that Revolution?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Plenty.""
links.text: "Plenty."

links.title: Shivers: "The streets ran red with blood. Dus..."
links.text: The streets ran red with blood. Dust swirled above the ruins. The pressure change from artillery fire ripped people apart in the top floors of the building above you...

links.title: You: ""Figured as much." [Discard thought..."
links.text: "Figured as much." [Discard thought.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A history of violence streaking al..."
links.text: "A history of violence streaking all across Revachol."

links.title: You: ""Kim, look... more bullet holes. So..."
links.text: "Kim, look... more bullet holes. Someone has been shot here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant inspects the wall, t..."
links.text: The lieutenant inspects the wall, then nods. "Another set of old bullet holes from the Revolution."

links.title: You: ""What's with all these bullet holes..."
links.text: "What's with all these bullet holes? I've seen a lot of them around."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at the wall. "..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at the wall. "Remnants from the Revolution. These are over half a century old."

links.title: You: ""So, no crime has happened here?""
links.text: "So, no crime has happened here?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Perhaps *a* crime of a sort, ages..."
links.text: "Perhaps *a* crime of a sort, ages ago... but no, these do not warrant an investigation."

links.title: You: ""Okay. But what can you tell me abo..."
links.text: "Okay. But what can you tell me about the Revolution?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not much. I don't have a *fresh pe..."
links.text: "Not much. I don't have a *fresh perspective* on it. Should we go?"

links.title: You: ""Never mind, then. Let's go." [Disc..."
links.text: "Never mind, then. Let's go." [Discard thought.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
links.text: The lieutenant nods.

links.title: You: ""Is there something we should do ab..."
links.text: "Is there something we should do about these?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, we're not constructors and ren..."
links.text: "No, we're not constructors and renovators. And these bullet holes do not warrant an investigation."

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]

links.title: Visual Calculus: "More old bullet holes, half a centu..."
links.text: More old bullet holes, half a century at least, from the Revolution.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "More old bullet holes, at least hal..."
links.text: More old bullet holes, at least half a century. A different era altogether.
